video_prompt: Young woman, dark hair, actively aiming pistol. Bright light flashes from barrel. Her body angles, arm blurs. Subtle white trails fall around her. Her gaze shifts. Muted background with twinkling sparks.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Semi-realistic portrait of a young woman, angled left, gazing at viewer. Dark hair with blue tint in a high bun, wisps, freckles. Olive-green eyes, shadowed. Metallic sheen on right shoulder. Dark, textured combat jacket. Left arm blurred, holding a pistol with a bright muzzle flash. Muted blue/gray background with bokeh and golden sparks. Determined and focused expression. Thin white trails from hair/shoulder. Single earring. Dynamic lighting from gun.
refined_video_prompt: Her body angles, an arm blurring forward in a precise aiming motion. A brilliant flash erupts from her extended hand. Her gaze subtly shifts. Subtle white trails drift and fall around her. In the background, muted elements subtly shift as tiny sparks twinkle.
